attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC continues to be an excellent public service of world class.

Budget cuts to the BBC will result in a lesser service.

The BBC has been innovative and kept itself up to date in these times. It should be rewarded, not punished!

We do not wish to have our license fees handed over to other commercial media outlets who have no history of developing for the public interest.

Please do not allow any redistribution to take place, and keep the BBC funded correctly!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
